forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 8am, then a slight chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 85. North northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 65. East northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 90. Southeast wind 1 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
